website_summaries.verdict: Fully adjustable thigh holster that’s made to accommodate the needs of many different people.
pros: You can adjust the length of the straps to fit circumferences between 19 and 27 inches
Also has a pocket to allow you to carry a flashlight
Made to fit either right- or left-handed configurations
Once you have it secured, it won’t slip out of place, even if you’re moving a lot
Uses an effective quick release buckle
cons: Holster starts to feel uncomfortable after wearing it for a few hours

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Its a great holster for my 1911 blowback co2 airsoft pistol. Its a little tight for my other guns, though this can easily be adjusted for as, practically, the whole thing is made of velcro and buckles for readjusting purposes. My only complaint is the fact that the button on the strap that holds the gun in the holster is a little difficult/akward to unsnap making it hard to draw quickly
customer_reviews.author: King of Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to give 5 star but...
customer_reviews.text: This drop holster is everything I was wanting can be adjusted for multiple weapons of multiple sizes. Seem to hold up but this review isn’t time tested or battle tested. All tie downs hold in place and haven’t loosened. Weapon stays put during movements in a civilian setting. Now the drawback which isn’t a dealbreaker. On most modern pistols the trigger guards are squared off. While holstering the square trigger guard will catch this holster. I’m guessing it will soften the material in time. Perhaps I have it to tight but I don’t want it to slide around or raddle around while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not a stable product!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for hunting season so I could still utilize my sr45 with my pack on. I wore this none stop for two days with heavy duty suspenders and no matter how tight I made the straps it would start at my hip and end up at my knee. Only reason for 2 stars is how well the actual holster held my pistol it was nice and snug very secure (in the holster). However, nothing but a wobbly mess on my leg. Both the leg straps and belt strap slipped as well would not stay at desired setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Overall well made, do recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 4 stars because it does what it's meant to. I ended up just ordering a hip holster though after this one. I do like it and it works fine though you'll have to take a while and get everything situated for your gun and leg. The velcro allows you to basically set it up any which way you want which is nice and the construction seems to be durable. I have no problem with the product itself and do recommend it. I just found myself more annoyed with my pants getting pulled up or the thigh straps slipping down no matter how I adjusted them. For comfort I just went back to a thigh holster.
customer_reviews.author: connor

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, adapted to thick quads and also crimson trace
customer_reviews.text: Everything is adjustable basically and the straps are pretty long. I was worried about it fitting my quads. If you are 6ft and have moderately thick quads it should work. Harder to go much taller than that I think. Easily adapted to SR9c with crimson trace, seems like it would fit almost anything except a large optic that didn't flip down. Whole holster is basically a velcro wrap you can tighten or loosen. Good snap closure retention. You will need to drill with the snap its on the tight side for good retention.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Brown

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy a better quality holster.
customer_reviews.text: This leg holster wasn't very comfortable, the top leg strap took most of the strap to fit around my leg and there is no end sowed on stopper piece, so it could easily come completely out of the plastic strap holder and slip off the buckle. And the actual holster has random velcro patches everywhere, with no clue what they are for. Because it literally did not come with any instructions, just a clear plastic bag with no words at all. It is quite stiff and not in the good way. All that makes it hard to actually use. Not good for use, should spend the extra money for a solid reliable holster..
customer_reviews.author: Shinobi H.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and configurable
customer_reviews.text: The full weight of the rig is supported at the belt; the leg straps are to limit horizontal movement. Attaching the holster to the waistband of a tactical vest does the job well, also. As for fit, the holster completely unwraps and can be adjusted to meet a pistol's muzzle length and wrapped back in place to meet the particular contours of the pistol. It is strong and snug, adjustable in every important way, has plenty long leg straps, and secure in holding the pistol. Very nice product, and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for the a sub $20 holster
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s hard to complain about this product. I think for what you are paying ($15) it’s a quality product. I just wish there wasn’t so much Velcro mainly the front strap that goes around the beaver tail. That to me could be and should be a button with a way to tighten it. The Velcro will wear out but for someone that’s on the fence and not wanting to pay up for a top notch drop leg holster. This is perfect for seeing if it’s something you may want. Over all I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it’s designed for
customer_reviews.text: If you’re of average intelligence this holster works for most firearms. It’s made of canvas, velcro, and plastic. It’s not designed to be a heavy duty tactical solution or even a daily wear. It’s a “in a pinch” light duty holster for firearms you may not carry often and/or don’t have a specific holster for. Use it when you go hiking or when you go to the range or something. It’s not smooth enough to be a quick draw holster or durable or secure enough to use in any professional sense.
customer_reviews.author: TAVM

customer_reviews.title: Quick release strap breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I used the quick release strap to draw rapidly like one would do in a necessary situation. Did so about 6 times before the snap broke, making the holster entirely useless against grab attempts. Which is the entire reason I bought it, for safety from grab attempts. If you want a stupid cosplay object for your Han Solo costume, it's great. Don't try to use it for anything serious though or you'll be replacing it quickly. Edit- the seller contacted me to inform me they had an issue with inspections and that I may have received a faulty product. They offered me a full refund and were very apologetic
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: All in all great drop leg for the price
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't holding its shape great right outta the box, but it's to be expect with a "universal" fit holster ....So I left my pistol in for a couple weeks ( when not using the pistol)......and it's retained its shape well since, durable nylon material, fully adjustable for safety clip and draw length and and secures during activity well with two thigh straps instead of many brands that only have one larger strap, would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: collin fTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: excellent leg holster
customer_reviews.text: its a fairly cheap item but its very well made i have banged it on all sorts of stuff and none of the buckles have broken and it has held the firearm in position through lots of physical activity this is done by being able to size the holster to each gun and the thumb strap i highly recommend this item i got the gray one which is pretty decent and looks just like the pick so i assume all the other colors do aswell
customer_reviews.author: jon mandingo

customer_reviews.title: For people with skinny legs only
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2", 275 lbs, not all that big, but even when fully extended, the leg straps are way too short, with the buckles coming up a full 6" shy of reaching each other. Longer leg straps would have been nice, or having advertised that this product is for small people only.
customer_reviews.author: David Meglemre

customer_reviews.title: 1 holster to rule them all.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Glock 21 Gen 4 with a O-light Baldr light n laser combo. I looked everywhere for a holster to fit this set up. So aside from paying 150-200 dollars for a custom holster, this was perfect. The price on this holster is amazing. It'll fit most any gun and light combo. So I can use with all my side arms. I wouldn't use it for duty work, but to take hunting or the range, it perfect. The adjustable straps fit my leg and can ride high or low on the hip. It also looks great, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost, will most likely buy another.
customer_reviews.text: The shear adjustability of this thing is surprising. I’m using this for my S&W Sigma 40 cal, that’s about as small as I would wanna go using this. You could fit a hand cannon in this thing if you wanted to. For less than $15 I will probably be buying a second just to have a different style, depending on my attire. Hope this helps make your decision.
customer_reviews.author: Old-Man-B

customer_reviews.title: Cleverly designed Drop-leg holster.
customer_reviews.text: Great holster. Will be versatile fo different sized pistol frames - medium to large. Fits my SW99 about as small as it will adjust. Clever design wraps around frame with lots of thick velcro. Belts and heavy snaps all work well. I am 5’8” and had it adjusted up aboutas short as it would go on my leg. Great Function and value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Dropleg Holster
customer_reviews.text: It's times like these I wish I weren't so optimistic. One of the pictures the Seller uses for this item shows the holster with a Desert Eagle in it. Upon opening the retention snap, it separated from the strap. I thought I may as well see how my DE fits while I'm at it since a new strap could be sent (although the chances it won't break again are likely 1,000,000:1). What I found is the DE in fact will not fit in this holster. Straight to Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Devin S. Castor

customer_reviews.title: Try it on right away
customer_reviews.text: I believe that the straps on the item I received were shorter than advertised. My thigh, 2/3 of the way up is 22.5 inches, just about 20 halfway up and I was unable to secure the holster to a point on my thigh that would allow for the holster to connect to my belt. I am returning the product and purchasing something else.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but needs to have instructions included.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great leg holster, adjust we'll, but whatever happened to including instructions in the packaging. You can adjust the holster in a lot of ways, but NOT without instructions. You can play around with it and figure it out, but the packaging needs to change to include the instructions on how to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Max N

customer_reviews.title: Adjustments on leg straps do not work.
customer_reviews.text: The leg straps do not stay to the size they are adjusted to. With just casual walking, they loosen in their own. Also, there is some random elastic piece with a small piece of Velcro that has no use or function. Will it work, yes. Will it be loose and swing while you are walking or running, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another drop leg i gave to my wife. I like this one better, for its adjustability, durability and apparent quality. It has many of the same adjusters, straps and buckles, but what stands out is the ability to accommodate a wider variety of pistols. For range day, I can choose which beauty to take! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your not going to use the retaining strap, ok buy.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on once so that I could make the adjustments for the handgun I would use it with and for my leg, the dang button on the retaining strap broke on the first pull. The rest of the rig is decent quality for the price but most adjustable holsters are roughly the same.
customer_reviews.author: m0rb1dt3x4n

customer_reviews.title: This Belt is a no Brainer
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe this system is only 11 bucks. Having no experience with thigh holsters I find this to be a lot of fun. I love the way the holster is a burrito wrap that is so versatile it will accommodate any medium to large size pistol. Smaller guns like Glock 43x and little mouse guns wont work. The holster will swallow them whole. Holster is meant for medium size guns IMO. Fits perfect on my Glock 23 and Kimber 1911. Would buy again even if it breaks in a few months. Sure its a little "plasticy" or wrtvr. but again, its only 11 bucks so..... come on. No Brainer.
customer_reviews.author: jodie lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great as a backup holster when you need one
customer_reviews.text: Great as a backup holster when you need one in a pinch. Keep mine in my range bag along with a custom fit Kydex. Adaptable and able to holster a VP9 with an Olight PL-Mini 2 and a Holosun 507c RDS. Nice snug fit adjustable to your liking and lockable with a loop. Price is decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pitogo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice well made holster
customer_reviews.text: Originally I thought this was a Conceal carry thigh holster but it is NOT. Irregardless, this holster is so nice! It works perfect for someone who likes to go to the shooting range or to carry it on you while in the woods. It is very comfortable and easy to adjust. It is made well and the velcro is good and sturdy. There is a side pocket for mase or maybe another magazine. The men in my life want one now and in the attached pic my husband has it on.
customer_reviews.author: TheCajunHippieMama

customer_reviews.title: Adjusted perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Okay...I have to admit, for the money, I had my doubts. But dang. Its built really well and it's comfortable. I bought it for my Browning Hi-power 9mm. It adjusted perfectly to fit it. The holster adjusts well and would hold a bigger gun such as a 45 semi auto very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Fully Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Fully Adjust tightness to leg, size of your gun from 22 cal to 45 cal, adjested with velcro strap to adapt for the trigger guard, thickness of the gun and the pull from the holster---- a great buy, better than the other 3 leg hosters I have bought from Amazon.... Nice price as well...
customer_reviews.author: Vegasglenn

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: Pulls down on the waist and the leg straps constantly fall out of place and limit your mobility. I have tried to adjusting it in so many ways for two days, my husbands has the same issues with the on I bought him. Not what I expected, but good for the price I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jpd

customer_reviews.title: Can be use for multiple weapons & accessories
customer_reviews.text: This holster is a very good value for the $$. If your side arm has laser or strobe mounted light this holster can be adjusted to fit. ***The leg harness need elastic loops to keep the extras neat AND avoid cutting them off***Or I just did reversed looping see picture
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Replace once a year type holster
customer_reviews.text: Update: removed the top strap and used that slot for a belt since the holster when normally constructed strangles your knee on steep inclines. Worked great until the stitching came apart just short of 1 year 100% customizable which was cool because it fits my full size P09 perfectly and fits my leg perfectly. Feels great and looks great. Only negative is it has a break in period I guess because out of the box, it was a bit flattened.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Very adjustable and fits, holsters, and draws really smooth. Dont know how durable it would be for combat. But, for basic practical use, and for the price it works great. Probably could adjust it to fit just about any gun.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Thigh rig is not for me
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Very durable. I am a bow hunter who hunts steep terrain and thought the thigh rig would work out well for me. I didn’t end up liking it though. The weight of the firearm pulled down on my leg and waist causing it to become more of a nagging irritation. The product itself is nice but I wasn’t a fan of the carry position.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the mag pouch & it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality holster for the price but I gave it 3 stars because a magazine pouch on a holster isn’t practical or functional, it can get it the way, it is something to get caught getting in and out of vehicles. I will remove mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rick O'Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was made better
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this because it’s such a great price to try out a new style of holster. Went to try it on and the snap on the retaining strap popped off instantly. Also be wary if you have large thighs as the leg straps weren’t all that long.
customer_reviews.author: sarah max

customer_reviews.title: Nice holster with a major weight restriction
customer_reviews.text: Nice holster, but a warning for “thicker” people, I’m right under 200lbs and a thicker thighs woman and That top strap ALMOST wasn’t bigger enough to make it around my thigh. I’m not sure if they offer a bigger one but the one I got cut it super close. If my thighs was like an inch or two bigger, the strap wouldn’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Elexis Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Got as an experiment, wasnt great
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality. As i walked the straps fell lose pretty fast. Not running just walking. Got it as an experiment because i never tried a drop holster, didnt spend a lot and got to try it. I could probably make it work if i zip tied here and there, but i really didn't like the feel of this style of carry anyway so its not worth the effort in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: David Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Dollars
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive solution to finding a holster for my full size auto with with suppressor attachment capabilities. Not sure how they can make it for this price?
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Extremely great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. You can put whatever pistol you want in it and form the hostler around it. Be careful on pistols with red dots it might not fit as well as you need. But it’s great with lasers and lights it allows the room for them. And it also has a one mag holder on the front, if you don’t want the leg portion you can unvelcro it and just use the Molle to your belt or vest. For the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits my full size glock 21 like a glove and extra mag fits perfect. Unlike simular products this one is actually amazing and holds a glock mag its hard to find something to hold a full size glock and a double stack extra mag but this thing fits like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Frost

customer_reviews.title: Miss me with that garbage
customer_reviews.text: Useless for anything except cosplay. Retention strap is in the wrong place, way too much Velcro everywhere, rolls on hip/leg like its not even strapped down even when I tightened it until there were bands across my thigh. Holster to hip belt is too long. Velcro strap for holster flap is in the wrong place. Looks ok without a pistol in it but when you try to wrap the thing around a gun you’ll find that it’s at an angle that only allows about 1-2 inches of usable velcro. All in all the only good thing about this is that I won’t miss the $13 I spent for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have high hopes for this but I bought it anyway. I was surprised on the quality and performance. It fit my full size, commander size and officer 1911’s as well as full size HK USP. I feel it will fit most hand guns out there. If your looking for a decent one size fits all holster without breaking the bank, this is your product. You won’t do quick draws but how many people really need to draw and shoot in .3 sec..... it is quick and easy to draw just not Competition set up
customer_reviews.author: Glenn U.

customer_reviews.title: Not very good product
customer_reviews.text: Just crap product . This is not like the other products on the market for just a few more dollars. I wish I would have not bought it.. but will probably give it my son to destroy.. the ailment for the gun and the magazines are no lined up at all..
customer_reviews.author: Frampton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/ quality control
customer_reviews.text: My son opened these to use as a last minute convention costume, and they sent him 2 right sided holsters. Made due because there was no time for a replacement, and then 1/2 way into day 1 the elastic ripped from the seem/ buckle and then he had to tie it to make it work through the day. Not worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyx5

customer_reviews.title: Nice Holster to Carry My Airsoft PPQ Around and Shoot Targets on Cardboard Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. I can use this to carry my real 9mm Walther as well. I am not so sure how to adjust it to fit well, but I imagine it will just take some patience. This is the first holster like this I have purchased, and it's very well made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits 6.5" revolver, and small compact hand guns. putting it on is easy, but you must have a good sterdy belt on, or this will really pull your waistband down. Found this holster good for target practice.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item a two star rating because the straps dont stay tight once you put them on. I have to keep readjusting the straps to keep the holster from not only dropping lower on my leg but also once it loosens up and drops down the front to back motion is so bouncy that you can run let alone walk very fast with it loaded with a sidearm and one mag. Im not dissing it 100 percent just honest feedback so the straps can be tweaked better.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Bailey

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: the second time i used the lock strap the button broke off now gun will not stay in holster. broke with 1 minute of use.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Plastic parts broke first use, don't buy this. I bought it to try a drop holster and should have paid for a better one because I used it the first time today (past return time) now stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: RAKC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Felt really cheap, doesn't fit any handguns that well. For stating: "this holster can be adjusted to fit just about anything," it cannot safely hold a Desert Eagle as some on here have stated. Maybe if you have the Mini-Desert Eagle, but not the full sized 50AE models. Even for one of my smaller handguns, I wouldn't trust this.

customer_reviews.title: Great holster
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good leg holster for hunting trips so that I coukd have my sidearm and still carry my rifle. Overall this holster was great. I liked how I could adjust it fit my gun snuggly. I wish that it had an two extra secure straps to keep the proximal part of the holster from dropping while hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reese

customer_reviews.title: WAY MORE THAN YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly this is my first drop-leg holster, however, I really was not expecting the construction to be as sturdy and complex for $12.00. I bought two; one for me and one for my son. These are VERY adjustable and sit right where I want my sidearm to be when I reach for it. Carries well while walking and flexes well while sitting or crouching. I would prefer a different retention strap for quick access but this will absolutely do just fine for the money!
customer_reviews.author: John Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: This holster is adjustable for many sizes and great for concealed carry
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Springfield .40XD and needed a holster. This holster is adjustable for many sizes and great for concealed carry. And the quick detach makes it easy to store by firearm before I enter an area that will not allow a firearm. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is all I can say for the price of it! Holds all of my handguns with just minor adjustments and also easy to adjust. Recommended for anyone looking for a budget universal drop down holster!
customer_reviews.author: Joemar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Just received today! Very easy to adjust and so far very comfortable! I'll post an update at a later date because it is early on. 🙂. So far I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: NerbysWife

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great holster, fits right onto your belt and you can adjust it to your thigh. I wore it with my tomb raider costume so it felt a little itchy on my bare legs, but I was able to survive the whole night so it wasn’t a big deal. This is something you would normally wear over pants anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work. I'm an average sized woman at a size 16 and it fits around my thigh but is extremely tight and I dont have large thighs at all. They should allow much more room to expand. Then on top of that, I couldn't return it. Be careful when purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great holster very Tactical
customer_reviews.text: This is a great holster for my Taurus G3, I use this holster during my armed security duties. It takes a while to dial in your exact area you want it to be at and the thigh straps will slide around on you but it does it job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Functional, Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits full size SR1911. Firm, good quality build and will hold with no danger of falling out. Takes some breaking in at first but overall fits like a glove. Easily adjustable. I trust to be able to take this into the outdoors for protection without it falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Drop Leg Holster, Right Handed Tactical Thigh Pistol Gun Holster Leg Harness
customer_reviews.text: For the experience personnel, i.e. military, police its a good match. But for the novice not so much! Thanks!! Kind regards, Techie
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: looks good for the price
customer_reviews.text: looks sturdy the only complaints I have it that the strap used to keep the pistol in the holster was not well though out and does not hold my 1911 as well as I had hoped. but for the price I can't really complain all that much.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bode

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Overall good. They are needed to be some updates. Little what I don’t like are magazine pouch is little tight and the degree of the button strip for lock for back of gun. But not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I adjusted the holster to fit my Kimber 1911 and adjusted it to fit me. While practicing drawing the weapon the snap on the thumb break broke in less than a dozen draws. Maybe its a fluke but my guess is that it's just not made well as the price would indicate.
customer_reviews.author: melissa konarski

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tactical holster it's kind of uncomfortable but thats probably because I've never worn one before. It's very adjustable and holds my colt 45 revolver just as well as any pistol.
customer_reviews.author: รM๏кคŦг๏И

customer_reviews.title: nice holster but as in all drop leg holsters
customer_reviews.text: nice holster but as in all drop leg holsters, after a long day of wearing it they tend to get very uncomfortable and move around way too much. There has to be a better way.
customer_reviews.author: Widmark R. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Lefty's but like the quality. Wear a wide leather gun belt to avoid sagging.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to adjust fit due to the strong Velcro. Fit my sub compact .45 well after struggling with the Velcro. My bad for not completely reading "usually for right hand." I thought it maybe ambidextrous which I need for a left thigh while riding my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Don'tGiveURPrivacy

customer_reviews.title: duck tape dream
customer_reviews.text: lots of duck tape will make it work, but it is not an out of box solution. it will take work to make it work reliably and securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my 45, however, the strap that keeps the gun in the holster doesn’t make sense and could be problematic in an emergency. Easy enough to cut off and attach one that fits my needs. Over all not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got nothing but positive comments. Great extra or primary holster. At this price, I'll probably buy another one. Wrapped a full size Glock with an Olight attached, which is what I was hoping it would accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Voss

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Could work without. Very sturdy. Durable and tatic friendly. Straps fit very nice and secure to your leg. 100% adjustable from the leg straps and the holster.. can't go wrong purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 1911.
customer_reviews.text: The holster is well constructed and sturdy, but also stiff (might break in). My biggest issue is that it's clearly designed for modern handguns with double stack magazines which means that with my nice slim 1911 it just doesn't have the kind of positive retention I want. Not the most comfortable thing in the world but I'm also not used to drop leg carry yet.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good holster
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well. Is comfortable for longer excursions and held my Canik TP9SFx peefectly fine even when doing strenous courses including running, jumping, and rolling.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money to get a custom fitting holster. That would be safer than this, because your gun can flop around inside those holster. It’s also very bulky and doesn’t seem to want to stay in place
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the world is weird right now and who knows what's next. Fits fine and holds all my pistols with all attachments no problem. Versatile fit, plenty of velcro. Seems comfortable enough for your standard boogaloo.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, retention button for thumb clip was broken coming out of the package. Poor rivet. The straps are super thin, not very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Ortiz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fully adjustable to fit many different pistols.
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of the leg holster. Fits any pistol with velcro adjustments. The comfort of having a lower leg holster is ideal for any outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent adjustable holster
customer_reviews.text: You can custom-fit this holster to whatever handgun you have. Very sturdy Velcro attachment. Very sturdy overall design.
customer_reviews.author: William Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Very small straps. Should specify this will not fit men
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap but it must be made for the ladies or smaller teens. I am only 170lbs and I have fairly small legs. This does not adjust big enough for my thighs, not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon r

customer_reviews.title: Not badd for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice fit for the gun. However one of the things I did not care for is when properly installed to the belled and around your leg it constantly pulls down on your belt causing a small amount of discomfort. And because of this I would only rated at about a 3 for the over all. For the value and stability for the firearm at self I would still give it at least a 4
customer_reviews.author: Rain Maker

customer_reviews.title: Not great for practical use
customer_reviews.text: The elastic straps on the side wouldn’t allow for a tight fit around the leg. I used it for an airsoft match and quickly found that I was better off without it. You get what you pay for. Overall, probably best for cosplay/costumes, however not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a terrible holster. You can make it fit just about anything, it’s very adjustable, but it’s not gonna fit anything very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and buy a better quality holster. The loop will not fit around a hunting belt.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 226 legion with valkyrie pro, and it's worked great so far. Good enough quality for me.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY GALE

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: To be honest i will never wear this, its not a holster, its dangerous to be honest, will return
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This leg harness is a pretty good deal for the money, it’s adjustable around the legs, you will have left over strap which I don’t like bc the way it looks, hold my Taurus 9mm perfect and secure as long as it’s strapped shut. Velcro is strong stitching is done really well. Looks very sharp when your wearing it, I take mine four wheeling and keeps my gun secure
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: Very Customizable
customer_reviews.text: This holster is made to be very durable and super adaptable to fit many different size pistols. For such a low cost, the product has performed great. I have not fully put it through its paces yet but I anticipate it wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Piece and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Quality on this product is awesome. A lot better then most for the price. Fits literally anything with just a few adjustments. I have big thighs and easily fit over my jeans with about an inch of top strap to spare. Had a little miss hap on the color sent to me but was able to get it all sorted out with the quick response of the seller. Awesome. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One star because it arrived late, Almost a month.
customer_reviews.text: One Star because it arrived almost a month late. As far as the quality goes, it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, he loves it. Piecing it together was a bit of a challenge since it came disassembled, but once he got it all connected it was exactly what he wanted. He said his 9 fits perfectly and its comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mullen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great
customer_reviews.text: Loved this!! The straps are fully adjustable so you can make it fit many different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: rroswell1

customer_reviews.title: Too Clunky
customer_reviews.text: Too big and clunky for my gun and too heavy to wear, even with straps. Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Save up for something better. There are no instructions on use. This one wouldn't even accommodate my laser sight on my Sig Mosquito without toggling the switch every time I holstered or drew.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Decently priced.  Very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a Ruger 1911 full-size frame. Very adjustable and it worked decently for what I wanted. Ended up buying the Blackhawk leg holster because of comfort. Overall satisfied for the price
customer_reviews.author: john pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Thick thigh beware....
customer_reviews.text: If you are naturally thick, this is not for you as it adds significant diameter to a thicker thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Leg Holster
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials. Fits my Glock19 with lower laser/light combo. A little tight on the thigh straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I was expecting. Mainly for airsoft play with a hk usp, but I use it for hunting with a taurus large frame. 357 as well. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Quasilogical

customer_reviews.title: Eu
customer_reviews.text: Tossed back in box. Holster is difficult to use with a 1911. catches inside to much.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hat

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cheap Chinese made imitation of a Condor drop holster. I’m using it for cosplay so I didn’t expect much. It will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Got this to wear around the house to protect from wild animals and local crackheads lol. It works, but the leg straps slide down my leg due to not having a friction material to keep them up.
customer_reviews.author: koorite

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: I just received it. I adjusted it to my gun. Until then, no problem. Then I tried to lock the fixing trap maintaining the gun in the holster and it broke. That is the only metal part of the whole thing and it is already broken! No need to say, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe C Le Dantec

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, adjust to just about any size pistol. My Sig M17's fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Daveh777

product_meta.title: Drop Leg Holster, Right Handed Tactical Thigh Pistol Gun Holster Leg Harness
feature_bullets: Thigh Holster Tactical Leg Holster,Wrap-Around design with adjustable Velcro strap，Usually for Right Hand, Right Thigh
the leg holster Strap can be fully adjustable for leg,fit for 19-27 inches Thigh circumference
the Leg holster Can be attached in the waist belt and fasten to the Thigh,Another Pouch fit with flashlight mount.
Dual thigh straps with non-slip backing and quick-release buckles.Fit for right handed or left handed.
there are some small different for the color during the light
